tuv.seg: Where to complain about a professional and others
Cén áit le gearán a dhéanamh faoi dhaoine gairmiúla agus daoine eile
Many professions and skilled groups have professional bodies to represent their interests
Tá comhlachtaí gairmiúla ag go leor gairmeacha agus grúpaí scile chun a gcuid leasanna a chur ar aghaidh
Most of these organisations maintain professional standards either through the provision of training or the accreditation of new professionals
Cothabhálann go leor de na heagraíochtaí seo caighdeáin ghairmiúla trí thraenáil nó creidiúnú dhaoine gairmiúla eile
Some have mechanisms for investigating complaints where their members do not adhere to the required professional standards
Tá meicníochtaí ag roinnt acu le fiosrú a dhéanamh maidir le gearáin nuair nach gcloíonn ball le caighdeáin ghairmiúla riachtanacha
Some have statutory responsibility for investigating such complaints
Tá freagracht reachtúil ag roinnt acu le gearáin a fhiosrú
If you have a complaint about a member of one of the following professions it is worthwhile to contact the relevant representative organisation which may be able to help you
Má tá gearán agat faoi bhall de na gairmeacha seo a leanas, is fiú dul i dteagmháil le hionadaí cuí na heagraíochta a d’fhéadfadh cuidiú leat
The Law Society is the statutory regulatory body for solicitors
Is é an Cumann Dlí an comhlacht reachtúil do dhlíodóirí
It makes regulations on among other things, standards and conduct
Déanann sé rialúcháin ar chaighdeáin agus ar iompar i measc rudaí eile,
It administers a compensation fund for losses suffered by clients through defaulting solicitors
Rialaíonn sé ciste cúitimh do chailliúintí fulaingthe ag cliaint trí dhlíodóirí mainneachtana
It has appointed an Independent Adjudicator
Tá Breitheamh Neamhspleách ceaptha aige (féach thíos)
The Independent Adjudicator of the Law Society’s role is to ensure that complaints about the conduct of a solicitor are dealt with fairly and impartially by the Law Society
Is é ról Bhreitheamh Neamhspleách an Chumainn Dlí ná a chinntiú go ndéileálann an Cumann Dlí go cothrom agus go neamhchlaonta le gearán faoi iompar dlíodóra
The Adjudicator cannot investigate at first hand a complaint about a solicitor
Ní féidir leis an mBreitheamh féin gearán a fhiosrú
Complaints about solicitors provided by the Legal Aid Board should be made as per the Legal Aid Board's complaints procedure
Ba chóir gearáin maidir le dlíodóirí ar fáil ag an mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil a dhéanamh chuig an mBord um Chúnamh Dlíthiúil
The Bar Council controls and regulates the professional conduct of barristers
Rialaíonn Comhairle an Bharra iompar gairmiúil na n-abhcóidí
The Teaching Council maintains a register of teachers and regulates the teaching profession and the professional conduct of teachers
Coimeádann an Chomhairle Mhúinteoireachta clár múinteoirí agus rialaíonn siad gairm na múinteoireachta agus iompar gairmiúil múinteoirí
It does not become involved in day-to-day contractual or disciplinary matters or complaints which can be dealt with more appropriately at local level
Ní bhíonn baint acu i saincheisteanna conarthacha nó disciplíneacha laethúla ná le gearáin ar féidir déileáil níos fearr leo ar leibhéal áitiúil
The Council’s role is limited to issues of serious professional misconduct or cases where a teacher is the subject of a criminal conviction
Tá teorainn ar fheidhm na Comhairle agus ní dhéileáiltear ach le mí-iompar tromchúiseach gairmiúil nó le cásanna ina bhfuil an múinteoir ina ábhar ciontaithe choiriúil
Such issues may lead to withdrawal of registration on a temporary or permanent basis
D’fhéadfadh tarraingt siar an chláraithe ar bhonn sealadach nó buan eascairt as na ceisteanna sin
The Teaching Council provides information about making a complaint about a registered teacher
Soláthraíonn an Chomhairle Múinteoireachta faisnéis maidir le gearáin faoi mhúinteoir cláraithe a dhéanamh
All the following organisations are professional bodies which set standards for their members
Is iad na heagraíochtaí seo a leanas na comhlachtaí gairmiúla go léir a leagann amach caighdeáin dá mbaill
Institute of Chartered Accountants has a complaints mechanism which deals with complaints against its members
Tá meicníocht ghearán i bhfeidhm ag Institiúid na gCuntasóirí Cairte a dhéileálann le gearáin a dhéantar i leith a gcomhaltaí
Institute of Certified Public Accountants has a code of ethics for its profession
Tá cód eiticí dá bproifisiún ag Institiúid na gCuntasóirí Poiblí Teastaithe
Association of Chartered Certified Accountants has a complaints mechanism which deals with complaints against its members
Tá meicníocht ghearán i bhfeidhm ag Comhlachas na gCuntasóirí Cairte a dhéileálann le gearáin a dhéantar i leith a gcomhaltaí
The Irish Association for Counselling and Psychotherapy sets standards and criteria for the practice of counselling and psychotherapy
Leagann Cumann Comhairlithe agus Sícteiripe na hÉireann amach caighdeáin agus critéir do chleachtas na comhairleachta agus na síciteiripe
It has a Code of Ethics and Practice
Tá Cód Eitice agus Cleachtais aige
You can take a complaint about a counsellor who is a member of this association
Is féidir leat gearán a dhéanamh faoi chomhairleoir ar ball den eagraíocht seo é/í
There are statutory regulatory bodies for the medical professions
Tá comhlachtaí reachtúla rialála ann do na gairmeacha leighis
In general, they promote high standards of professional conduct, maintain a register of qualified personnel and investigate allegations of professional misconduct or fitness to practice

Go ginearálta, cuireann siad ardchaighdeáin d’iompar gairmiúil chun cinn, coimeádann siad clár de phearsanra cáilithe agus imscrúdaíonn siad líomhaintí i leith mí-iompar gairmiúil nó oiriúnachta chun cleachtadh
You can find more information about regulatory bodies for medical professionals on our website
Féadfaidh tú teacht ar bhreis faisnéise faoi chomhlachtaí rialála le haghaidh gairmithe leighis ar ár láithreán gréasáin

The Private Security Authority (PSA), established under the Private Security Services Act 2004, is the statutory body with responsibility for regulating and licensing the Irish private security industry

Is é an tÚdarás Slándála Príobháidí (USP), a bunaíodh faoin Acht um Sheirbhísí Slándála Príobháideacha 2004, an comhlacht reachtúil atá freagrach as tionscal slándála príobháidí na hÉireann a rialú agus a cheadúnú
It has been introducing licensing on a phased basis to the various sectors of the security industry
Bhí ceadúnú á thabhairt isteach ar bhonn céimnithe do na hearnálacha éagsúla den tionscal slándála
Information on the sectors for which licences are required and on the requirements for identity badges (pdf) is available on the PSA website
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéis ar na hearnálacha óna dteastaíonn ceadúnais agus ar na ceanglais le haghaidh suaitheantais aitheantais (pdf) ar láithreán gréasáin an Údarás Slándála Príobháidí (ÚSP)
A dispute with a bookmaker at a horse racecourse or greyhound track is handled by Horse Racing Ireland or the Irish Greyhound Board respectively
Láimhseálann Rásaíocht Capall Éireann nó Bord na gCon, faoi seach, díospóid le geallghlacadóir ag ráschúrsa capall nó rásraon con
If you have a dispute with a bookmaker elsewhere, you may be able to refer the dispute to the Independant Betting Adjudication Service (IBAS) in the UK provided the bookmaker is registered with IBAS

Má bhíonn díospóid agat le geallshealbhóir in áit eile, d’fhéadfá bheith in ann an díospóid a chur faoi bhráid na Seirbhíse Neamhspleáiche um Breithniú Gealltóireachta (SNBG) sa RA, a fhad agus go bhfuil an geallghlacadóir cláraithe leis an SNBG
Under the Gaming and Lotteries Act 1956, Section 36, a gaming or wagering contract is not enforceable and you cannot pursue a dispute through the courts
Faoin Acht um Chearrbhachas agus Crannchuir, 1956, Alt 36, ní féidir conradh cearrbhachais nó geallchuir a chur i bhfeidhm agus ní féidir leat leanúint le díospóid trí na cúirteanna
